title: Generative AI Foundations
subtitle: Understanding the Core of Modern AI Systems
description: Explore the fundamentals of generative AI models, their architecture, and applications in modern technology.

instructor.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
instructor.title: Lead AI Researcher
instructor.bio: Dr. Chen has over 10 years of experience in AI research and has published numerous papers on generative models.

whatYoullLearn: How to implement basic generative models using Python

modules.title: Introduction to Generative AI

lessons.title: What is Generative AI?
lessons.description: An overview of generative AI and its impact on technology.

lessons.title: Historical Development of AI
lessons.description: Trace the evolution of AI from its early days to modern generative models.

lessons.title: How Generative Models Work
lessons.description: Deep dive into the technical aspects of generative models.

modules.description: An introduction to the world of generative AI and its foundational concepts.

modules.title: Building Your First Generative Model

lessons.title: Setting Up Your Environment
lessons.description: Configure your Python environment for AI development.

lessons.title: Implementing a Basic Model
lessons.description: Step-by-step implementation of a simple generative model.

modules.description: Hands-on implementation of generative models using Python.

reviews.comment: Excellent course that breaks down complex concepts into digestible segments. Would highly recommend!
Great content, though some sections could use more practical examples.

title: Advanced LLM Applications
subtitle: Building Production-Ready AI Systems
description: Learn to create and deploy sophisticated applications leveraging large language models.

instructor.name: Prof. Michael Torres
instructor.title: AI Systems Architect
instructor.bio: Prof. Torres specializes in designing scalable AI systems and has worked with major tech companies.

whatYoullLearn: Design patterns for complex LLM applications

modules.title: Architecture of LLM Systems

lessons.title: Understanding LLM Architectures
lessons.description: Examine the architectural components of large language models.

lessons.title: System Design for AI Applications
lessons.description: Learn how to design robust systems around language models.

modules.description: Explore the architectural principles behind modern LLM systems.

reviews.comment: The depth of content is impressive. I've implemented several techniques from this course in production.
